content.question: Do you want to apply to claim your divorce costs?
content.introWhenClaimingAdultery: You can ask the court to order your {{ divorceWho }}, and/or the person with whom the adultery was committed, to pay some or all of the divorce costs.
content.introWhenNotClaimingAdultery: You can ask the court to order your {{ divorceWho }} to pay some or all of the divorce costs.
content.infoAboutFees: This could include all the fees you have to pay during the divorce, such as application fees, solicitors fees, and additional court fees.
content.warning5YearsSeparation: The court does not normally make a costs order where the application is based on 5 years separation.
content.whoCosts: Who do you want to claim the costs from?
content.youHaveToPayFeeNow: The court will make a judgement on who should pay, and how much, at a later stage in the divorce.
content.youHaveToPayFeeAppNow: You'll have to pay your application fee now.
